website_summaries.verdict: While the design may not work for everyone, the RHA T10i earbuds are great-sounding and well-built, with some nice extras, including three sets of swappable acoustic filters.
pros: The well-crafted, uniquely designed stainless-steel RHA T10i earbuds sound great and come with an abundance of accessories, including three sets of acoustic filters, 10 different eartips and a carrying case
You also get an Apple-friendly inline remote/microphone for making cell-phone calls
cons: They're a little weighty for in-ears and may not fit everyone comfortably
Some of the inline remote's functions won't work with Android and Windows Phone devices

website_summaries.verdict: The RHA T10i is a well-made earphone pair with plenty of useful accessories and a sound signature that positively oozes bass.
pros: Powerful, distortion-free audio performance with intense low-end response
Excellent array of accessories that enhance fit and audio performance
cons: Boosted bass isn't for those seeking accurate frequency response

customer_reviews.title: RHA FTW
customer_reviews.text: Got mine on offer for around £70. At that price they are a steal. Was initially disappointed, but quickly realised the fault was my phones. They sound amazing with my iPhone compared to my HTC 10 and even better on my PC. Tight bass, wide and controlled mids, crisp highs. I couldn't ask for more. The fit can take some getting used to, but after a week or two it becomes natural. Three year warranty seals the deal.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Savage

customer_reviews.title: Well made, nice and heavy and durable / heavy duty material
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and durable and heavy duty. At first i was disappointed as they didn’t sound loud enough because i love extremely loud music, however after changing EQ settings on my iPhone and letting them play for a while they did open up and started producing very loud music they just needed time to readjust and for them to start working properly (few hours). I changed my mind about returning them and i am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Bleron

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Suffer from tinnitus as a result of DJing in clubs. So needed a good pair of headphones that would give great audio quality and depth at lower volumes. These hit the mark, awesome sounding headphones. Could go a lot louder if needed but are fine at lower volumes. Recommend memory foam tips for these such as these to get the best results:  KB.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. K. J. Bowley

customer_reviews.title: As usual from RHA a brilliant product.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot recommend these highly enough - bought to replace a pair of RHA 750i headphones which eventually wore out. The sound quality is spot on for me. People will bemoan the inserts, and too much/little bass etc. I'm a 'general populous' user and these are on the mark. Less bass, but more realism than Bose headphones. Great sound isolation on the plane. Very, very comfortable to wear. Also, customer service is second to none. When my RHA 750i headphone cable wore through after two years they send me a replacement pair no quibbles at all.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence Pitt

customer_reviews.title: They are the best personal headphones I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my girlfriend for her birthday. I've got shure 425s. I can't believe the sound that come out of these. They are the best personal headphones I've ever used. They come with loads of options but straight out the box you can feel the quality of the driver. The bass pumps well and you don't lose the clarity of the mids and treble. If you're looking for the best headphones under £500, you've found them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Insane audio and build quality
customer_reviews.text: Build and audio quality of the these things is insane. Was concerned they might feel heavy due to the stainless steel construction but they are more comfortable than other iem style headphones I have used previously. I've been searching for something to replicate the performance of me UE triple fi 10 these do and on initial impressions are much more durable.
customer_reviews.author: ben w parkinson

customer_reviews.title: Top quality and very comfortable with excellent sound.
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews on all of the top ear bud headphones I opted for these and was not disappointed. Read reviews on the weight but when wearing these you don't notice it and they are really comfortable. Sound is excellent though I couldn't tell much difference between the filters, I suppose it's down to the quality of the recording. Tried Bose and Shure and these are much better, feel robust and work perfect with my iPhone. Would definitely recommend them just wish that the new T20 had the mic and remote as the dual sound system would make this the ideal head phone.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Carl Hutson

customer_reviews.title: Considering the amount these cost I am very disappointed and thought that although the sound quality was good
customer_reviews.text: My headphones have broken. One of the earbuds is now not working at all. Considering the amount these cost I am very disappointed and thought that although the sound quality was good, the build quality was not good enough. The wire started deteriorating very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Moffett

customer_reviews.title: These sound amazing and are extremely comfortable - both in-ear and over
customer_reviews.text: These sound amazing and are extremely comfortable - both in-ear and over. However mine developed a fault within the first 3 months of purchase, causing sound to only come through the left ear. With a little twirling around at the input-jack, I could get sound through both, although the problem started again if I was to moved the wire. They have stopped working altogether today - 8 months after purchase. To be honest I expected better build quality for £150.
customer_reviews.author: Dan C

customer_reviews.title: No plastic!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks RHA, for leaving all my other headphones behind, in a cloud of dust! I have a few. If you are the one reading this then do not think again, if you don’t get these you are making a serious mistake! Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but.....
customer_reviews.text: Average sound but not mind blowing, too many options and not much sound difference in the various different changeable options a lot to fiddle with. Noise Cancelling was good Very well made. Expensive. Better sound quality out there for less money.
customer_reviews.author: RolandOlliff

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Very clean sound with deep bass
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Very clean sound with deep bass. very well made the filter do as they say. Wonderful headphone
customer_reviews.author: R.D. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: The RHA 10I is very poor and I feel a mug for buying them. I have some AKG headphones at less than half the price that are far superior.
customer_reviews.author: neil79

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sennheiser momentum are cheaper and better quality, their good but not good enough for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Leandro

customer_reviews.title: Just the best
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best in ear earphones I've ever used. The wire is damn long though, but those moments when you get the fit right, and your music plays, it's an intense experience! You'll appreciate your music so much more and after using these for about half a year now I've never once regretted buying them! Would definitely recommend it to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Jervies Mariano

customer_reviews.title: Great sound with the bass and treble filters
customer_reviews.text: Great sound with the bass and treble filters, but the standard filter is not balanced. The material is of great quality, made to last for decades, and I don't have a doubt it would last for a century without wear. It is a bit heavy on my ear, so it is not suitable for all people. But I loved it, and I am buying the new model.
customer_reviews.author: Anat Media Ltd

customer_reviews.title: Very Neat Pair of headphones with good quality sound and feel solid with the aluminium in ...
customer_reviews.text: Very Neat Pair of headphones with good quality sound and feel solid with the aluminium in ear 'bits'. The curver around is also very comfy. One small complaint - Don't got very loud and i love my music loud! Otherwise they are amazing and i shall be keeping them after trying 4 other headsets!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Chulani

customer_reviews.title: microphone does work on android
customer_reviews.text: Amazing earphones my first premium earphones. Amazing sound quality also the microphone does work on android. I've tested the mic on a nexus 6 with android version 5.1 and a moto x with android version 5.0. Not sure if it will work with a Samsung or HTC phone but will work on any nexus or motorola phone.
customer_reviews.author: Javad B.

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Still going strong a year later. Very happy with sound and build quality.
customer_reviews.author: D. Scott

customer_reviews.title: I'm a little disappointed, because for £ 150 I expected more from ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little disappointed, because for £ 150 I expected more from the quality of the sound, and I could not try the low-cut filter because it was stuck in the metal plate.
customer_reviews.author: Redis Ziu

customer_reviews.title: Budget for Replacement Parts!
customer_reviews.text: Owned for 1 month and have lost x2 filters and x2 tips. Not very secure unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb Quality and Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones. It took a bit of time to find the right set up for me in terms of filters and buds, but once I did the quality of sound is superb. They are also very comfortable and really well made.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart S.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and build. Maybe the cables a bit on the heavy side, but built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Rajen66

customer_reviews.title: Love / hate
customer_reviews.text: Hmm these take a hell of a lot of getting used to. On the one hand the sound is pretty amazing - detailed and roomy - and bassy if you want it, if a bit cold. On the other hand being cold to the touch, their dead weight and weird hook over the ears feels alien to start with and is not secure - they instantly fall off as soon as I try and run with them. And the thick rubbery cable is really annoying to untangle. As a result I've been using them a lot less then my previous earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic service, this company are super professional answering all ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic service, this company are super professional answering all my questions promptly and helping me out with outstanding product. This was a present for my boyfriend and he loves the sound and been geeking out on youtube testing sound on it and really loves the quality. The packaging is impressive with lots of sound options and ear options too. Can't recommend them enough.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Ned

customer_reviews.title: I found the treble filters the best as it seems "louder"
customer_reviews.text: They are ok. Not really loud. Can't really tell why they are so expensive as the sound clarity isn't much different to other headphones in the £70-£80 range. I found the treble filters the best as it seems "louder". Pain to put on too. When you're in a rush and try to put the ear phones on quickly I seem to keep fumbling about trying to get them round my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Heshan Abhayaratne

customer_reviews.title: Terrible build quality - regardless of warantee
customer_reviews.text: I am now on my fourth pair lf earphones which have developed yet another fault, I've had four pairs of these earphones in 6 months all of which have broken, I've decided to give up on these IEM's.
customer_reviews.author: Declan Earwaker

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but....
customer_reviews.text: Amazing but i hope they start making costume ear buds you can buy separate for them
customer_reviews.author: Calum davies

customer_reviews.title: bad cables
customer_reviews.text: cables broke after 6 weeks - trying to send back but its not clear how
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Brown

customer_reviews.title: Bass-heavy, poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: OK - These get one star for outstanding build quality; the other for very good design. The sound quality is poor, however - the bass and mid-bass drown out the mids to the extent that I don't really want to listen to them. Even with the treble filters the bass is so overwhelming, muddy and impossible to ignore.They need equalisation, and that is the sign of a poor driver inside; good iems don't require EQ enhancements. They are easily bettered by many iems in the £50 to £70 range. Buy at your peril. And if you don't believe me, read the appropriate thread over on Head-Fi.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Richards

customer_reviews.title: Good but not better than the cheaper MA750i
customer_reviews.text: I bought these at the same time as the RHA MA750i and honestly I could not make them sound any better. I played with different tips, different filters, and I got the best seal I could, yet the 750is just sounded better. Build-wise and comfort-wise the T10i are better, but sound-wise I just found them a little lacking in clarity. Yes the bass is strong, but it felt as though this was at the detriment of crisp sound from everywhere else. I really wanted to like these but they didn't justify the price tag for me. Save your cash and get the 750i instead
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Hitchplop

customer_reviews.title: Buddy
customer_reviews.text: Best earphones I've ever used, well worth the price. The inserts work as intended, the copper does increase treble without losing bass and vice versa for the steel, the aluminium is a brilliant mid. Only complaint is the plus and minus buttons don't work with android. A brilliant selection of buds, two sizes of marshmallows with inbuilt filters, two double flange pairs in separate sizes and a range of single flanges. Perfect for anything, the insert holder plate allows you to preselect buds.
customer_reviews.author: Jonsson A.

customer_reviews.title: The sound is like no other
customer_reviews.text: The sound is like no other, and i love the design. The one (quite significant) drawback is how annoying the adjustable part for fitting around the ear is. Everytime i put them on i have to readjust the shape, and it never feels right. The buds also gradually slip out of my ears no matter what buds i use or how i secure the adjustable part. Again as i have seen others say, for those who wear glasses, be aware that both your frames and the earphones will be battling for space over your ear, and this can be quite uncomfortable and very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Pierce Cambay

customer_reviews.title: A new standard in ear bud excellence!
customer_reviews.text: Have had many ear buds and all left a great deal to be desired...except these hi-res ear buds. These produce a quality sound which rivals my over the ear studio reference hi-res phones. Quality in craftsmanship is superlative. These are truly value for money. Fit is great and fully adjustable - how refreshing that is! Great job isolating the outside 'din'. RHA has a definite winner with the T10i.
customer_reviews.author: JLN

customer_reviews.title: Great headphone and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: As an owner of the Bose QuietComfort 20i Acoustic, I can say that this headphone delivers amazing sound quality, even better than the Bose (given that the Bose headphone is 2 years older than this). There are some issues with the fit of attached earbud and the design may not work for everyone but they are not big concerns for me. I would give 4.5 star for the headphone alone. However, the customer service is great. My headphone got some problem (bear in mind the travel bag is not hard case) after 6 months. Contacted the Customer service, send them back and got a brand new one replaced in 2 days. Could not ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: hoang

customer_reviews.title: Great IEM
customer_reviews.text: Received them on Friday and after 10-15 hours they sound fantastic the bass is awesome and with the treble filter applied they sound the best for me. They provide a very comfortable fit as well. It is my 3rd Rha set of earphones i had the 450 , 600i and this. It is the best by far and a big step up from the 600i highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: piotr dawidowski

customer_reviews.title: great sound
customer_reviews.text: I really can't say much about this product. It's a great British product with great sound and good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Abdel

customer_reviews.title: sound good but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: The headphones sounded pretty good. However, when I tried to change the filters, one of them didn't screw in properly and the thread seemed to be worn. I then noticed a black greasy substance on both earphones as if they'd been worn before or not quite finished properly. Also small blemishes on them straight out the box. I've sent them back and I'm awaiting a refund. Ashame, as their pretty good earphones, but for £150 I'd expect them to be working straight out the box and not look as if they've been worn before.
customer_reviews.author: CK1888

customer_reviews.title: Too bad that RHA don’t make those in wireless
customer_reviews.text: Too bad that RHA don’t make those in wireless. Those ieb sounds simply amazing ( all around) sound quality, stereo-separation, clarity, built handcrafted!) couldn’t be more satisfy. I wish the wireless M750 sounded like the T10i
customer_reviews.author: Alexia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Another fantastic pair of earphones by RHA. The sound on these are second to non and from previous experiences, RHA customer service is brilliant
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great items, sound quality is great as you'd expect from RHA
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Love these earphones so much
customer_reviews.text: Love these earphones so much. The isolation is better than the ABC on some other headphones I've used. Not to mention the customer service is unbeatable. 100% recomend.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: It's top quality but would like if the volume could go a little higher but ...
customer_reviews.text: It's top quality but would like if the volume could go a little higher but everything else is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good earphones. Great sound when paired with chord mojo. Recommended for those who like a more bassy sound.
customer_reviews.author: K. J. Ward

customer_reviews.title: RHA T10i review - terrific
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased, have been looking for a good set for a while. Had tried the new Bose earphones but was not impressed. These are terrific.
customer_reviews.author: John Clark

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are but everything I wanted when I ordered them! I expected the build quality to far outweigh the sound quality in terms of why the price was high, but these are honestly the best headphones I have ever listened to! Very very impressed with the clarity of highs and lows, even with the reference filter fitted (which I most commonly use). I would certainly recommend these to anyone who is looking for a high quality earphone with a bit extra to spend. Even though the high price point may turn you away, you will honestly never find a pair as good as this for close to the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Lord

customer_reviews.title: Too big and heavy for earbuds.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, and I like the idea of being able to play around with the bass and treble, and they come with lots of different sized earbuds. But, they are too big and heavy for my liking. I like earbuds that I can keep in my jacket pocket and don't even feel them when they're in my ear. I can feel these things weighing down on my ear when I'm wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: wolf_e81

customer_reviews.title: So while I loved the sound quality and the overall feel of this ...
customer_reviews.text: These broke less than four months after purchased. The seller, THOUSANDS OF ELECTRONICS told me this purchase was past the 90 day window for exchange due to defect. I then contacted RHA to replace the item and was told the warranty was voided because THOUSANDS OF ELECTONICS is not an authorized dealer. So while I loved the sound quality and the overall feel of this item, DON’T BUY IT from THOUSANDS OF ELECTRONICS. Make sure you are purchasing from an authorized dealer.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Pechlivanos

customer_reviews.title: Required for best reproduction, especially base
customer_reviews.text: Had these for almost a year. Sound reproduction is phenomenal. Listening to uncompressed music (FLAC or vinyl) you can absolutely hear a difference between these and some of the more popular brands, That being said, they are not the LOUDEST earbuds I've used and they accurately reproduce base. So if you want your base emphasized you have to do it in an equalizer. I have had ZERO issues with these and they provide enough ear inserts that you will find one that perfectly seals your ear with the buds. Required for best reproduction, especially base.
customer_reviews.author: Burk

customer_reviews.title: don't stay on well, wire over ear is cheap
customer_reviews.text: these look pretty darn good but they are pretty heavy. i didn't think i'd care when i read other reviews saying that but trust me you will after a while. the wire that loops around your ears isn't very good either. it doesn't hold shape that well and after about 5 months the wire on the right side is now broken (ordered 6 months ago). apart from those these sound great though, it's got some good bass if you need that and it's very clear in all other aspects. the cord is very thick and durable, but keep in min there's also no mic. all in all, for 130 dollars i wouldn't recommend these
customer_reviews.author: brent bevens

customer_reviews.title: This in-ear set is great in this regard
customer_reviews.text: I listen almost exclusively to classical music, in which clarity of instrumental texture is crucial. This in-ear set is great in this regard. There is a slight mid-bass enhancement in the T10, which in most cases would be welcome. In full symphonic orchestration, however, the tuba and string basses overwhelm just a bit. If this bothers it is easily corrected with the "bass reduction" tab in the iPad equalization. I have ordered the RHA T20 set, though, which are supposed to be without the bass enhancement. I'll keep both sets and use both; that's how much I like the RHA T10.
customer_reviews.author: Johnlouis

customer_reviews.title: Fit is perfect and I wear these for side sleeping
customer_reviews.text: Highest quality cables and ear buds. The quality jumps out. Fit is perfect and I wear these for side sleeping. The adjustable sound filters make anything sound great. Plenty of deep accurate bass with all 3 filters. Treble filters can be a little bright depending upon the music, but find myself using these the most. I don't usually spend over $100 on earbuds, but this was worth it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: George McGorge

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sound great
customer_reviews.text: I hear things in these headphones I've never heard before in songs. The sound quality is amazing. I took off one star because they tend not to stay in my ears super well when running or doing other exercise requiring lots of motion. They don't fall out, but do come out enough that the great sound quality is diminished to good sound quality. Very well made, though.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Ruzicka

customer_reviews.title: Great sound not so great durability
customer_reviews.text: I've have these earbuds for a little over a month I've been very careful with them until one night accidentally fell asleep with them,as a person who sleeps on his left side I woke up to find a crack in the wire of my left earbud where the wire meets the black plastic part its has since gotten worse and I was dumb and didnt get the warranty I'm now down 150 dollars I would like to rate higher but for the lack of quality I just don't see myself buying another pair
customer_reviews.author: Gavincf

customer_reviews.title: WOW, JUST WOW!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome earbuds!!!!!!! I used to have Bose Quite Comfort20. Love the silence they bring to blocking outside noise, but the quality of sound compared to the Rha t10i is significantly better on the RHA's. Bose are like listening to private concert with blues brothers. RHA T10I is like having Maria Cary giving you a private concert. The Bose are too expensive for the quality of sound. They do have a good sound, just not at the level they should be for the cost. Bose does do a very good job at blocking out eronius sounds. Good luck at making your choice of ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed

customer_reviews.title: Would absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I really do love these. They're so comfortable i can even sleep with them, lay on my side, head on pillow and can't even tell they're in. Noise isolation is great without that "plugged up" feeling of noise canceling. Do give them some burn in time, they sounded a bit "PA system" sounding until about 10-15 hours in. I just plugged them in and let them play and they loosened up and started sounding much warmer. Tons of ear tips to choose from to get just the right fit. Really really happy with them so far.
customer_reviews.author: GigaTigga

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Great sound defination
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Great sound defination, great bass response, better fit (for me) than the 750i. Warning - you will do a lot more fiddling with these when you first get them, trying out your music and the filters, the ear buds, etc. but once you get them dialed in - just perfect. UPDATE: after 9 months right headphone is completely shot. Something with the over the ear cord. Depending on how it is bent the sound comes on and off. This is my 2nd pair of RHA's to do this. Had same problem with 750i which was serviced/replaced by RHA.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Awesome awesome and more awesome (updated)
customer_reviews.text: Got them today. So far the drivers are really good and great sound stage can't wait to fully break them in!. They are little bass heavy but with the filters can change that. Only thing I can say bad is one of the tips was missing from the package. Also the foam ear tips fall off way to easy. Over all well worth the money! Taking away 2 stars. Due because I sent them a email telling them my package was missing a ear tip and foam tips will not stay on. So stars being taken away due to no response from CS at all. Great product some best ear puds I have own but lack of CS is sad.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Adam Mckeithan

customer_reviews.title: Slightly tinny, also don't get very loud and I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: Slightly tinny, also don't get very loud and I'm not a person who listens to music very loudly. Maybe they need an amp. Been using with LGV20.
customer_reviews.author: Majonez Winiary

customer_reviews.title: Best In-Ears I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best In-Ears I've ever owned. Great quality. They fit PERFECTLY. (You chose the bud to attach because they come with many different sizes) The sound quality and feel in your ears is great. I would NOT recommend wearing these running though. Since they fit snug, you have a "vacuum feel" in your ears thus you can hear your heart beating and the pounding of your body hitting the ground.
customer_reviews.author: James Martin

customer_reviews.title: Next level listening
customer_reviews.text: I had big expectations with these headphones. I also spent way more then I needed to for these. Having said that these headphones are so good that I would pay the conversion rate again. These headphones have great bass when you let them break in a bit and the treble is insane too. I really can't hype these headphone enough. Only complaint I have is the volume doesn't get quite as loud as I want and you have to be still to really appreciate all the sounds you can't hear while moving (obvi). Overall rating Dope AF!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Best earbuds at the price range.
customer_reviews.text: RHA earbuds, one of its kind. It’s on the heavier side but it makes up for it with its quality. And the RHA customer support; best customer support I have ever come afross.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Try these out and youll thank me
customer_reviews.text: Best ear buds I have ever used.I originally was skeptical about the price tag on these but finally decided to get them after months of starring at them.I really see now why there valued at such a high price the specs on these buds are absolutely astonishing.All I can say is if you don't have a pair try these out and you will thank me.
customer_reviews.author: Russianheroe

customer_reviews.title: Good product, love the sound
customer_reviews.text: Good product, love the sound. While the fit in the ear is good, the wrap over the ears is not initially the most comfortable but you get used to it, mostly
customer_reviews.author: Howdy Doody

customer_reviews.title: Exellent quality and comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: It has a excellent sound and build quality. The sound is highly detailed. It has a little bit warm, flat sound signature. The listening experiment is not boring. Really enjoyable, I always find some new detail`s in my collection. It has a great price point! Highly recommend every one, who looking a premium headset and don`t want to compromised in the sound quality. Serious headphone for serious people.
customer_reviews.author: David Agoston

customer_reviews.title: Very nice premium construction
customer_reviews.text: Very nice premium construction, the cable and connectors are sturdy. I like the bass and the general sound, not an audiophile by any means... I thought they would feel uncomfortable due to the metal and around the ears shape but they are ok. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Gallardo

customer_reviews.title: Best buds I've tried yet under $200
customer_reviews.text: These are impressive buds, both form a sound quality and incredible build. A little heavy on the Bass even with the Treble Tuner but they sound better than my B&W C5 and B&O Play 3I. These buds are very comfortable and don't seem as heavy as some have noted in the past.
customer_reviews.author: 3Charlie

customer_reviews.title: I love these I never leave my house without them and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these I never leave my house without them and they offer great contrast with HD8 DJ's from Sennheiser and with the reference filter on bass and treble are balanced and perfect for any type of music these are like the SE 846 from Shure but slightly lower sound quality and depth but are 1/5 the price and I love them as a daily driver (I don't own the 846 but my friend does and they're almost identical in treble and reference filter options but bass on 846 is tighter and has more punch)
customer_reviews.author: Shari Underwood

customer_reviews.title: these pair of headphone sound beautifully with whatever piece of sound i throw to them
customer_reviews.text: these pair of headphone sound beautifully with whatever piece of sound i throw to them. i would definitely buy them again if i needed to but since it comes with a 3 year warranty i think its gonna take some time for that to come. currently im having some problems with the right hook but im hoping the best for them to fix that for me since im still on the guarantee time.
customer_reviews.author: pablo cañedo

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound!!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Amazing sound across the entire range. Very good undistorted bass response without it being overwhelming. Mid and treble is excellent with a lot of clarity and headroom. Build quality would be perfect if it weren't for the replaceable threaded filters whose threads are hard to align. Cons: A bit heavy due to stainless steel construction. They weigh 41g so be aware if you plan on wearing these for long periods or for sport activities. Could not really notice a difference between the three sound filters supplied.
customer_reviews.author: MadZar

customer_reviews.title: so anyone that enjoys their bass will enjoy these IEMs
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit bass heavy, so anyone that enjoys their bass will enjoy these IEMs. I however prefer more treble. They still sound exceptional and the build quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: I love having the ability to swap out different filters based ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is absolutely superb. I love having the ability to swap out different filters based on my listening preferences. They feel solid and look impressive. My only complaint is that I wish the carrying case they came with is hard-size instead of soft-sided, but it's still a high-quality case.
customer_reviews.author: A.Swartz

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as previous models.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this earbuds as an upgrade of my m750i, because a realy like them. Im sadly to say that the t10 are not as good as the m750i, they simply dont have the crisp and detailed sound of the other model. So if your looking for great sounding earbuds, buy the m750i.
customer_reviews.author: Olmo

customer_reviews.title: These are probably the best In-Ear headphones I've purchased
customer_reviews.text: These are probably the best In-Ear headphones I've purchased. I listen to mainly hip-hop but I will sneak in some rock as well. The T10i are the only in-ear headphones that do not fall out and I've tried the Ur Beats by Dre as well as cheaper brands. The design speaks high end and the sound is just that, also they come with a 3 yr warranty so I believe I am now a customer for life...
customer_reviews.author: Tonefitzlock

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphines I've had in Awhile
customer_reviews.text: Theses headphones come with the filters the Bass filter is by far the best in my opinion. Note that they are not as comfortable as the Bose Q10i quiet comfort, but much better sound and they come with many different ear tips to fit your ear.
customer_reviews.author: Shameem

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: They earphone are of high quality with durable cables, the earphones provide a great sound stage and great bass. I personally think the case could be better but it still has great protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow. I'll have these a while i think!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Sound is so subjective, but I am enjoying the sound quality immensely. Over the ear cable is excellent to have.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Superb value for a high quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality as advertised. Love the stainless steel shell and high quality cords. Excellent sound. Amazing to get such a deep,full base out of something so small - while still delivering crisp highs. My only suggestion is something this good be protected in a hard shell case instead of the soft case provided.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff L

customer_reviews.title: Built very well but sound terrible and have no bass
customer_reviews.text: Built very well but sound terrible and have no bass. If you like lots of treble these are perfect. The control buttons only work for the stupid iPhones and no droids. Over all I'd never recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: David Carmical

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome ear phones
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome ear phones. They fit well although they slip out of my ears a bit. That may be my problem finding the right tip though. They are comfortable. I use these every day. They sound amazing. The build materials are top notch. The only fault I find is the cord. It's very rubbery. It gets caught on everything. It tangles and is hard to untangle because the wire sticks to itself.
customer_reviews.author: A. J.

customer_reviews.title: What an technophile wants...
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for my son...he's a MS Engineer, so I knew it needed to be really well made to suit him. It did...he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: my0pinion

customer_reviews.title: Only if you like In Ear Monitors.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my ears don’t have the ability to hold “in ear headphones” well. They fall out easily . All metal construction does not allow flexibility
customer_reviews.author: Ryan T

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: It comes with three (3) interchangeable sound shaping attachments emphasizing either bass, treble, or a balance between the two they call "reference". I prefer the reference ones; good bass that won't overpower treble.
customer_reviews.author: PageMaster

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: this product is well made and makes perfect sound. got to try different tips for perfect one that fit you. recently used this just for noise cancellation during flights and it makes a lot of difference when you are wearing it. this probably would last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: nonoe

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these headphones for a while. I followed them from inception (Kickstarter) and I was not disappointed. Fully customizable, you can hear all aspects of quality in your crappy choice of music - yea your music sucks - but no other in ear headphone can make it sound this good.
customer_reviews.author: Dale M.

customer_reviews.title: Must buy you movie freaks.
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered on time. The feel, the experience, the snugness of the fit, the taste of sound flowing in your aural world is just worth it. I specially love war movies apart from instrumental music. The high definition sound engulfs as you need to be. The construction of headphones is top class and there is no quality issue. Beginning from packaging to putting them on the ears, its just worth every penny/dime/dollar/rs/yen spent on it. I also do lot of Binaural sounds, it totally suits the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Hemant Chauhan

customer_reviews.title: Nice but heavy
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and looked nice but the weight of the product would not work for me. Returned
customer_reviews.author: JoDee

customer_reviews.title: and the sound is absolutely fine. And at such a resonable price
customer_reviews.text: Every maker of much more pricey earphones needs to take a cue from these. The build quality is awsome, and the sound is absolutely fine. And at such a resonable price, too.
customer_reviews.author: Donald H. Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the most expensive in-ear headphones I've ever owned, but they're by far the best sounding. Super tight bass, and exceptionally clear everywhere else. The catch is finding the right combination of filter/ear tips. The tips are a bit tricky to get on, but I'm over that. Once you figure out which ones are best for our ears, you'll love them.
customer_reviews.author: leftcoastwood

customer_reviews.title: Great in ear headphone
customer_reviews.text: These sound great, only complaint is the cord is a little heavy, wish they would of used a similar chord to the vmoda m100, but that is being nit picky, Well worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: steggalc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product until T20i was announced. Returned it and ordered T20i instead.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great IEM's!!
customer_reviews.text: I'll keep this short. These headphones are amazing!! I purchased them as a warehouse deal and totally got my money's worth. I would give them 5 stars but they arrived with one set of foam tips replaced with rubber ones. I only use foam tips as they provide the best seal in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Skoman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Incredible sound, amazing looking; some of the tips are a bit uncomfortable for people, but they can be replaced. Would 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Smita S. K. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price tag!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones with great sound quality and can be worn all day at my job without getting uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Fox

customer_reviews.title: these are exactly what I was looking for, sonically ...
customer_reviews.text: these are exactly what I was looking for, sonically. They've got plenty of the low end. Maybe too much for some people but just what I needed. I unfortunately could not get them to fit properly in my ear.
customer_reviews.author: John Thomakos

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't tell the difference between ear tips
customer_reviews.text: I can't say if these were good or not since not a one of the earbud tips fit my ears properly without hurting them or making the sound awful.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones even tho it's the older model the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones even tho it's the older model the bass is deep and I'd love the memory eartips!
customer_reviews.author: Laodude

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Bass Heavy Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: The bass these produce seems impossible for in-ear headphones. It brought a smile to my face immediately, I don't know what kind of sound I was expecting but it blew me away. These headphones are bass heavy but do not distort the sound at all, very deep and clean bass, again, it seems impossible that these little things can pump out that kind of sound without distortion. Buyer beware, these are very bass-ey headphones, even with the non-bass tips they are still bass heavy. For everyone else, have fun because these are stellar. You get the sound of pair of beats solo 2s without the hassle of carrying those things around.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These Phones rock the bomb ! If you are a serious audiophile add these to your priority list.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M.

customer_reviews.title: Best head phones I've owned!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome head phones! Amazing sound! Very happy with these. These sound fantastic and fit well. I thought they would be heavy seeing they are stainless steel buy they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Doug G.

product_meta.title: RHA T10i High Fidelity, Noise Isolating In-Ear Headphone with Remote and Microphone
product_meta.description: Style:With remote and mic| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingT10i: High fidelity, noise isolating in-ear headphone with remote and microphone The stainless steel T10i features a handmade dynamic driver (model 770.1) engineered to reproduce all genres of music with high levels of accuracy and detail. A unique tuning filter system allows for frequency response customization and patent pending moldable over-ear hooks ensure a comfortable, noise isolating fit. Handmade, high fidelity dynamic driver (770.1) model engineered to accurately reproduce all genres of music with high levels of clarity, detail and imaging. Noise isolating design. Metal injection molded, stainless steel construction. Interchangeable tuning filters with holder.3-button remote and microphone for use with compatible Apple devices. Selection of dual density silicone, double flange silicone and memory foam ear tips. Multicore, reinforced, oxygen-free copper cable with gold plated connection. Patent pending, moldable over-ear hooks. Premium carry case and stainless steel ear tip holder.perfect fit:The T10i features unique, patent pending over-ear hooks designed to hold the headphones in position with the cable running over and behind the ear. Three year warranty.
